title: Sherbro New Testament Portions
description_vernacular:
Lomthibul Sana Ŋbolomdɛ ni Hɔbatokɛ: Sherbro New Testament
Pelesi Ŋbolomdɛ:  Ŋhɔk mamdɛ cheko limdɛ! Ŋcha bi ŋchɔmalen ŋa ŋhɔk ma mɔɛ? Ŋcha si ŋhɔ hɔk ma mɔɛ ma teŋga teŋgaɛ? Ŋcha si lɛ pelesi ŋbolom ma nsendɛ ma ka hani 1839? Nchema hi ha ha Hɔk Hɔbatokɛ kɔ theɛni hɔk ma hi ŋbolomday ha mɔ cheɛ thɛk ha lanɛ la Baybul Sosayti ŋa haɛ ni lomthibul sanaɛ ni Hɔbatokɛ ŋhɔ pelesiɛ ŋhɔk ma hiay (Ŋbolomdɛ). Ŋhɔk ma hi kabandɛ ma chache teŋga teŋga ! Hi bɔ kaŋ ni hi gbala ŋhɔk ma hiɛ! Ma bi ha bɔk anya gbee ko Hɔbatokɛ Ŋhɔk ma hiɛ ma fɔsa ! Hɔk Hɔbatokɛ ŋhɔk ma hiay ma bi ha bɛma hini ha bi ŋkwath ma Hɔbatokɛ ni theni yekɛlɛŋ ha wɔn. Ŋa hun hi hamani ya mpanth chelɛ hɔk Hɔbatokɛ kɔ theɛni ŋbolomday mɔgbo pa hɔɛ Hɔbatokɛ wɔn ayɛn wɔ theli ŋhɔk ma hiɛ.
